title: Ep. 59 - Moon Poop Monsters
description: Todd, Digs, Gorman and Gator hold down the fort while Pat and the #RoadHawks continue their travels on The Road To Wrestlemania.  They kick things off with a call-in from friend of the show @garygulman who explains why he thinks this younger generation is getting a bad rep for being soft.  The boys also discuss generational differences among the group as they point out things they each miss from the past as well as things they were glad to see go.  They cover climate change, global warming, life on the moon, the zika virus, Canadian border crossings and they close things out with a couple listener questions.  Enjoy.
dc:creator: The Pod
